info.name: tonic-showcase
info.description: Some example requests you can use to test the API

request.description:
This request logs you in by sending your credentials and receiving the API Key.
If you successfully logged yourself in, replace the value of api-key header in the other requests with the token of the response.
creates a RON campaign, so there is no keyword or category targeting
creates a keyword campaign, so there your campaign will be targeted by the list of keywords you provide
creates a category campaign, so there your campaign will be targeted by the category you provide via category ID

response.name: create category campaign
response.body:
{
    "campaign_name": "CHOCOLATE-CAMPAIGN",
    "ad_type": "ppr",
    "campaign_type": "category",
    "budget_spread": false,
    "cpc": 0.2,
    "url": "http://gph.is/2cpbE6Y",
    "status": "paused",
    "budget": 50,
    "targeting": {
        "country": "US",
        "traffic_category": "non-adult",
        "categories": [
            7
        ],
        "device": [
            "desktop"
        ],
        "browsers": [
            "safari"
        ],
        "os": [
            "macintosh"
        ]
    },
    "conv_value": null,
    "time_settings": {
        "start_date": null,
        "end_date": null
    },
    "whitelisting": false,
    "folder_id": null,
    "campaign_id": "5c13bafd4f45dd62587d2ee3"
}

list campaigns

item.name: get campaign statistics by source id

request.description: receive a list of all categories you can apply to campaigns

response.name: get categories

request.description:
It is mandatory for our mobile campaigns to have set a carrier. As there are multiple carriers, you can get a list of carriers we support with this helper endpoint.

We recommend you cache the carrier list, as it will only change in rare occasions.

We accept country codes according to ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2  which define two-letter country codes. If you do not want to implement this yourself, you can use this helper endpoint.

We recommend you cache this list, as it is unlikely to change.

item.name: create daily report job for a campaign
create one-time report for single campaign
